mapper.insert: insert into memberInfo values(0, #{nickName}, '', password(#{pwd}), #{tel}, #{email}, '', now(), 1)
mapper.select: select mno, nickName, realName, tel, email, photo, date_format(regDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') regDate, status from memberInfo where (nickName=#{nickName} or tel=#{nickName} or email=#{nickName}) and pwd=password(#{pwd})
